author: ceki
msg: Modified jalopy settings to format multi-line comments (the * chars) and also to parse/format comments.

author: ceki
msg: Added a clear method in order to clear the MDC entries as requested by Fergus Gallagher.

author: mwomack
msg: Changes to support generic gui viewers in ChainsawAppender.  ChainsawAppender compatible viewers must implement the ChainsawViewer interface.
Moved gui related code from Main.java into DefaultViewer.java, and added implementation of ChainsawViewer interface.
Start.java creates a default ChainsawAppender if no configuration file is specified.

author: mwomack
msg: Applied checkstyle changes from Paul Smith.
